name: evm-search
title: Evm Search
description: Find information about EVM chains including Chain IDs, TVL, and RPC Endpoints.
author: d3or

commands.name: index
commands.title: Search EVM Chains
commands.description: Find information about EVM chains including Chain IDs, TVL, and RPC Endpoints.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
